pullRequest.title: Fix task caching issue by using the output file to decide if models and spec are equivalent.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Using the property from the task doesn't work when the task is loaded
from cache. The right solution is to read the summary file which
contains the compatibility check report.

commit.message:
Fix task caching issue by using the output file to decide if models and
spec are equivalent.

Using the property from the task doesn't work when the task is loaded
from cache. The right solution is to read the summary file which
contains the compatibility check report.

nodes.bodyText:
maybe at least logging whether the task is successful?
Personally I prefer to log all executed, skipped uptodate status.
nodes.diffHunk:
